conversation.text: Admirable, to be sure. But you'll have to kill me first.
Auntie... you've always supported me. Do we really have to fight? Is your father worth that much to you, even after all he's done?
Aria, when you grow old you start losing the luxury of choice. I've invested my life in his. I have my regrets. But he has made me very powerful. And I enjoy this power.
I see. Then may the best sorceress win.
Heheheh... I like you, Aria. Always have.
